document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Palaearctic (excluding North Asia) ( Gültekin & Fremuth 2013 ).

Material examined.
76 specimens ( ZIN , KUMN , ZMUK , NSPU ) from 16 provinces were studied.
Cherkasy Prov.
:
1 spec. ( ZMUK ) Kanyv , Reserve , N.D. Globova leg.,
19.vii.1946
;

:

;

13.v.1897
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Simferopol , A. Bazhenov ,
29.v.1899
;

:

on

;

Biology. Wetlands and forests, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in IV–VII. Oligophagous on
Anthriscus
,
Conium
,
Heracleum
and another generis of Apiaceae ( Eichler 1951 ; Scherf 1964 ; Krivets 2007 ; Volovnik 1994a , 2007 ; Zotov 2009b ; Dedyukhin 2012 ).
